name: Big Tree Farms Organic Brown Coconut Sugar - Coconut Palm Sugar, Unrefined, Fine Crystals, Cane Sugar Replacement, Coconut Blossom Nectar, Vegan, Perfect for Baking - 1 Pound (Pack of 1)
short_description: BROWN COCONUT SUGAR - A natural sweetener, made only from the coconut blossom nectar of the coconut tree. Smooth and rich with hints of warm caramely notes
THE BENEFITS - Our coconut sugar is organic, Unrefined, unprocessed and rich in essential minerals and aminos acids and can be a 1:1 substitute for refined cane sugar
GLYCEMIC INDEX - Our Coconut Sugar has a glycemic index rating of "Low" versus cane sugar which is rated "High" which makes it a better alternative for special diets
SUSTAINABILITY - Coconut Trees produce 50-75% more sugar per acre than cane sugar. A coconut tree can produce nectar for 40 years so they are never cut down after each harvest
OUR MISSION - We have blossomed into the world's largest and most sustainable coconut supply chain, and we remain committed to positively impacting our farmer communities, our health, and our planet
product_details: Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 9 x 2 x 6.5 inches; 1 Pounds

name: BetterBody Foods Organic Coconut Sugar, Gluten-Free, Non-GMO, Low Glycemic Sugar Substitute, 1.5 lbs, 24 Ounce
short_description: REFINED SUGAR ALTERNATIVE: Organic Coconut Sugar makes an excellent 1 to 1 ratio (spoon for spoon) replacement to refined sugar; That means it's easy to switch out sugar or artificial sweeteners for BetterBody Foods Organic Coconut Sugar in simple meals and gourmet recipes; The possibilities are endless

LOW GLYCEMIC INDEX: Ranked lower on the glycemic index than traditional sugars, BetterBody Foods Organic Coconut Sugar offers a sweet option that fits a variety of lifestyles and preferences—ideal for those mindful of glycemic impact

MILD CARAMEL FLAVOR: Organic Coconut Sugar from BetterBody Foods has a subtle caramel like taste, offering a unique alternative to refined sugars. It's a delicious way to sweeten your morning coffee, tea, or bowl of oatmeal or cereal

UNREFINED FOR BAKING and COOKING: Having traveled the world to find the best food, we found the perfect sweetener for all of your cooking and baking needs; Cookies, cakes, muffins, brownies, pancakes, and many other foods can be sweetened with our premium Organic Coconut Sugar for a better alternative to granulated sugar

COCONUT SWEETENER: Our Organic Coconut Sugar is made from the nectar of coconut tree blossoms and is minimally processed for versatile use in your kitchen. It’s USDA Organic certified, gluten-free, non-GMO, and kosher
product_description: Sweeten things up with our Organic Coconut Sugar. Made from the nectar of coconut palm blossoms, this golden-brown sugar brings rich, mellow flavor with subtle notes of caramel. It’s an easy 1-to-1 swap for brown sugar in your favorite recipes—perfect for baking, coffee, or sprinkled over your morning oatmeal. With a naturally low glycemic index, it offers a gentler alternative to traditional sweeteners without compromising on taste.

name: Z Natural Foods Organic Coconut Sugar - Nutrient-Dense, Flavorful & Unrefined Brown Coconut Sugar - Perfect for Tea, Coffee, Oatmeal, Deserts & Baking, Non-GMO, Vegan, Gluten-Free, 10 lbs
short_description: 𝗣𝘂𝗿𝗲, 𝗡𝘂𝘁𝗿𝗶𝗲𝗻𝘁-𝗗𝗲𝗻𝘀𝗲 𝗦𝘄𝗲𝗲𝘁𝗲𝗻𝗲𝗿 𝗠𝗮𝗱𝗲 𝗳𝗿𝗼𝗺 𝗖𝗼𝗰𝗼𝗻𝘂𝘁 𝗦𝗮𝗽: Our organic coconut palm sugar is made from the sap of coconut palm trees, which is boiled into syrup and then dried into granulated sugar. This nutrient-dense, unrefined sweetener is a healthier, natural alternative to traditional sugars.

𝗟𝗼𝘄 𝗚𝗹𝘆𝗰𝗲𝗺𝗶𝗰 𝗜𝗻𝗱𝗲𝘅 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗦𝘁𝗲𝗮𝗱𝘆 𝗘𝗻𝗲𝗿𝗴𝘆: With a glycemic index of only 35, this coconut palm sugar promotes a gentler rise in energy levels, making it an excellent choice for those seeking healthier alternatives to traditional sugar. Swap it in your daily coffee or decadent desserts without the worry of sugar crashes, helping you feel energized throughout the day.

𝗙𝗿𝗮𝗴𝗿𝗮𝗻𝘁 𝗖𝗼𝗰𝗼𝗻𝘂𝘁 𝗦𝘂𝗴𝗮𝗿 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗧𝗼𝗮𝘀𝘁𝗲𝗱 𝗖𝗼𝗰𝗼𝗻𝘂𝘁 & 𝗖𝗮𝗿𝗮𝗺𝗲𝗹 𝗡𝗼𝘁𝗲𝘀: Indulge in the natural sweetness of coconut sugar, which delivers hints of toasted coconut and caramel, offering a flavor reminiscent of maple sugar. Its subtle yet distinctive flavor adds depth and complexity to coffee, tea, oatmeal, baked goods, and more.

𝗛𝗲𝗮𝗹𝘁𝗵𝗶𝗲𝗿 𝗦𝘂𝗴𝗮𝗿 𝗦𝘂𝗯𝘀𝘁𝗶𝘁𝘂𝘁𝗲 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗘𝘃𝗲𝗿𝘆𝗱𝗮𝘆 𝗨𝘀𝗲: Easily swap traditional sugar with coconut palm sugar in a 1:1 ratio for all your favorite recipes—baking, desserts, or beverages. Non-GMO, vegan, and gluten-free, it’s a wholesome, versatile addition to any kitchen pantry.

𝗦𝘂𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗶𝗻𝗮𝗯𝗹𝘆 𝗦𝗼𝘂𝗿𝗰𝗲𝗱 𝗘𝗰𝗼-𝗙𝗿𝗶𝗲𝗻𝗱𝗹𝘆 𝗦𝘄𝗲𝗲𝘁𝗲𝗻𝗲𝗿: Harvested from coconut palm trees that thrive in depleted soils, our organic coconut sugar is a sustainable alternative to sugarcane, yielding twice the sugar with less environmental impact. By choosing this natural sweetener, you’re supporting sustainable farming practices and helping to preserve the planet while enjoying a healthy, guilt-free sweetness.

name: Pinky Up Coconut Sugar, 3.5oz Flavored Sugar, Finishing Sugar for Cocktails and Tea, Coconut Flavored for Coladas, Cocktail Rimmer, Home Bar Accessories, Margarita Party
short_description: VERSATILE BAR SUPPLIES - This coconut sugar is the ultimate addition, perfect for enhancing flavors of cocktails, used as a margarita rimmer or simply sweetening your tea. Comes in a 3.5 oz. glass jar. Add this in your list of bar essentials.

INDISPENSABLE COCKTAIL ACCESSORIES - Perfect for rimming cocktails like margaritas or daiquiris along with a wide array of beverages, drinks, and desserts like shortbread cookies. A must-have in any margarita bar for a delightful sweet, nutty flavor.

EXCELLENT SANDING SUGAR FOR BAKING - It's perfect as a finishing sugar for scones and muffins or as a coarse sugar for baking topping, adding a hint of sweet and nutty taste. A perfect addition to your bartender accessories or bar cart accessories.

MULTI-FUNCTIONAL MARGARITA RIMMER - This coconut sugar is a perfect margarita rimmer, adding a delicious twist to your cocktails. It's a vital part of your bar stuff, and can also be used in baking, coffee, lattes, tea, and other beverages.

GIFT-WORTHY RIMMERS FOR DRINKS - Gift this coconut sugar to tea lovers or cocktail enthusiasts. As one of the best rimmers for drinks, it's a unique addition to any margarita accessories collection, ensuring memorable and flavorsome beverages.
product_description: Stir a little tropical taste into your beverage of choice with Pinky Up's Coconut sugar. Simply add a spoonful or two to your favorite drink, close your eyes, and listen for ocean waves and luau music!3.9 ozAdds flavor complexity to teaGreat for flavoring any beverage

name: Snowy River Coconut Cocktail Sugar - All-Natural Rimming Sugar for Stunning Drinks – Vibrant Colors & Gourmet Taste – Perfect for Cocktails, Mocktails, Baking & Desserts - 3oz
short_description: Sweet Coconut Cocktail Sugar: Give your margaritas, piña coladas, & cocktails a delicious coconut-flavored rim that adds a tropical twist & a touch of sweetness to every sip, making drinks look & taste amazing.
Easy-to-Use Sugar Crystals: These sugar crystals stick to glass rims easily, adding a smooth, eye-catching coating that makes your drinks stand out with a sweet coconut flavor and a pop of style.

Great for Cocktails & Mocktails – Ideal for tropical cocktails, classic margaritas, and mocktails, this coconut rimming sugar adds a burst of flavor and a fun finishing touch to your favorite beverages.
Simple & Fun for Any Occasion: Just moisten your glass rim, dip it in the sugar & enjoy! Great for summer parties, beach gatherings, or anytime you want to add a little tropical flair to your drinks.

Also Works Well for Desserts: Not just for drinks! This coconut sugar is great for decorating cakes, cupcakes, & fruit, adding a sweet, tropical touch to desserts while bringing flavor & style to your creations.

name: MADHAVA Organic Coconut Sugar 3 Lb. Bag (Pack of 1), Natural Sweetener, Sugar Alternative, Unrefined, Sugar for Coffee, Tea & Recipes, Vegan, Organic, Non GMO
short_description: ORGANIC COCONUT SUGAR—TASTE THE DIFFERENCE: Scoop or sprinkle some of our delicious organic coconut sugar with this pack of 1, 48-ounce bag of MADHAVA Organic Coconut Sugar

INDEPENDENTLY AWARDED FOR PURITY: Continuously tested by The Clean Label Project to verify we are a leading coconut sugar brand avoiding more than 200 contaminants including heavy metals (lead, arsenic, mercury), pesticides and insecticides (including glyphosate)
AUTHENTIC COCONUT SUGAR: Harvested on multi-generation family farms in Indonesia
SUSTAINABLY HARVESTED: Our organic coconut sugar is harvested from coconut palm trees in partnership with local organic and non GMO farmers who share our values of doing good for people and the earth
CLEAN & SIMPLE: Our organic coconut sugar is USDA Organic, Non-GMO Project Verified, Kosher, gluten-free and vegan, and is packed in BPA free packaging
1:1 REPLACEMENT FOR OTHER TYPES OF GRANULATED SUGAR: Our coconut sugar is a natural sweetener, use it as a sugar alternative—no recipe changes needed

UNREFINED MULTI-USE NATURAL SWEETENER: Replace refined white sugar, brown sugar and ‘raw’ sugars in all recipes and beverages (including tea and coffee) with pure and unrefined organic coconut sugar from MADHAVA

PASSION FOR PURITY: MADHAVA started making honey in 1973 and although honey will always be our first love, we’ve made room for other clean and simple organic food like agave nectar, coconut sugar, extra virgin olive oil and culinary vinegars
product_description: MADHAVA Organic Coconut Sugar is sourced directly from two non GMO and organic co-ops in Central Java with farmers who share our values of doing good for people and the earth. Each co-op consists of hundreds of small family farms where the skills to harvest and cook the sap are passed down through generations. When MADHAVA started making honey in 1973, we were shocked that food companies tinker and toil with synthetic formulas, trying to re-create authentic flavors. We knew there was a better way. So, we ventured into deserts in Mexico, climbed trees in California, and sapped flowers in Asia – in an obsessive pursuit of purity. As our company has evolved since 1973, so has our passion for purity in all foods. It’s now our mission to get clean ingredients to tables across the country – and the world. In our pursuit of purity, we’ve partnered with the Clean Label Project to double and triple check that our MADHAVA methods prevent environmental and industrial contaminants from getting in, resulting in natural, organic, rich flavors you can trust. Every MADHAVA product is Clean Label Project certified and continuously tested for hundreds of toxins and contaminants.
product_details: Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 2 x 1 x 1 inches; 3 Pounds
Best Sellers Rank: #1,503 in Grocery & Gourmet Food ( See Top 100 in Grocery & Gourmet Food ) #1 in Coconut Sugar

name: Mayan's Secret 2 lbs USDA Certified Brown Coconut Sugar Organic for Baking - Low Glycemic | Unrefined | Trace Minerals
short_description: USDA CERTIFIED ORGANIC COCONUT SUGAR — 2 LBS Made from organically harvested coconut palm sap and gently processed into fine brown crystals. USDA Organic, vegan, non-GMO, unrefined, and free from artificial additives or preservatives—packaged in a value-size 2 lb resealable pouch.

RICH, CARAMEL-LIKE SWEETNESS WITHOUT STRONG COCONUT FLAVOR Delivers a warm, brown-sugar-style taste with subtle caramel notes. Mild and balanced in flavor, making it ideal for baking, cooking, and beverages without overpowering recipes.

IDEAL FOR COFFEE, TEA & HOT BEVERAGES Dissolves easily in hot drinks such as coffee, tea, cocoa, and lattes. Adds smooth, consistent sweetness while allowing the original beverage flavors to shine through.

EASY 1:1 SUBSTITUTE FOR TRADITIONAL BROWN SUGAR Use as a direct replacement in cookies, cakes, muffins, brownies, sauces, glazes, marinades, oatmeal, yogurt, and desserts for familiar texture, moisture, and color.

VEGAN, PLANT-BASED & PACKAGED FOR FRESHNESS Naturally plant-derived and suitable for vegan lifestyles. Resealable packaging helps maintain freshness, texture, and flavor—perfect for pantry storage, baking, and everyday use.

name: GULAJAWA Javanese Coconut Sugar 100% Pure Palm Sugar Caramel-Toffee Flavor for Beverages, Baking, Dry Rubs & Seasoning. Gourmet gift for Home Cooks, Chefs, Coffee Lovers & Baking Enthusiasts - 1lb.
short_description: 👵🏽 ARTISANAL JAVANESE TRADITION: Hand-cooked for 6 hours in small batches (2~6 lb) using century-old techniques by highly-skilled sugar cooks.
🍮 RICH CARAMEL & TOFFEE FLAVOR: A multi-dimensional flavor profile that upgrades everything from morning coffee and tea lattes to gourmet seasonings, BBQ dry rubs, and complex cooking sauces.

⛰️ HARVESTED TO ORGANIC STANDARDS: Sourced from coconut palms thriving in naturally organic-rich soil. Our nectar is sustainably hand-tapped and fed only by pure rainwater, adhering to strict chemical-free standards for maximum purity.

🛡️ PROTECTIVE PACKAGING FOR FRESHNESS: Packed at origin in metalized lining to shield the sugar from light, oxygen, and heat. This ensures the complex aromas and moist texture remain fresh for professional use.

🍯 GENTLE SWEETNESS: An unrefined, low-GI alternative to cane sugar. Gulajawa offers a sophisticated sweetness that complements delicate ingredients rather than dominating them—ideal for organic-focused lifestyles.

🔪 FOR THE ADVENTUROUS COOK: The specialty sugar for home cooks, professional chefs, baking enthusiasts, and serious coffee lovers who demand a complex, unrefined flavor to elevate their culinary creations.
